Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.listener

Interface TermsAndConditionsListener

public interface TermsAndConditionsListener
The TermsAndConditionsListener class is used for the getTermsAndConditions events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onError(MobileGatewayError mobileGatewayError)
    In cases where an error occurs, this method will be called.
    void
    onSuccess(String productId, TermsAndConditions termsAndConditions)
    If the request is successful, the SDK will give the card product identifier and TermsAndConditions object containing the texts for the display.

  • Method Details

    • onSuccess

      void onSuccess(String productId, TermsAndConditions termsAndConditions)
      If the request is successful, the SDK will give the card product identifier and TermsAndConditions object containing the texts for the display.
      Parameters:
      productId - An unique identifier of the card product.
      termsAndConditions - An object having terms and conditions to display to user to start the digitization of the card

    • onError

      void onError(MobileGatewayError mobileGatewayError)
      In cases where an error occurs, this method will be called.
      Parameters:
      mobileGatewayError - This error is returned when there is a problem retrieving the terms and conditions.
